description: Meet the SB14, an exceptional high-accuracy, low-profile bending beam engineered with a wide array of capacities to suit your diverse needs. Boasting full stainless-steel construction and hermetic sealing, this remarkable load cell guarantees unwavering accuracy and unparalleled robustness, even in the harshest industrial environments.

Designed to excel in high accuracy weighing platforms, the SB14's blind-hole load introduction arrangement, in combination with self-aligning feet, establishes it as the ultimate choice. Embrace the confidence of precise measurements and seamless performance with the SB14, elevating your industrial applications to new heights of efficiency and dependability.
keyFeatures: Wide capacity range from 500lb to 10,000lb (227kg to 4,536kg)
options: Y = 23,000 for C3 and C3 MI6 (for 500lb to 5klb)
